amendment.description: Amendment sought to subject Congressional appropriations bills to dynamic scoring and to change the threshold to trigger such scoring to $1 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 113-400 to subject Congressional appropriations bills to dynamic scoring, and to change the threshold to trigger such scoring to $1 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 214 (Roll no. 159).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Connolly.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 214 (Roll no. 159).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
